search_input:
Although ornamentation might have gone out of fashion a bit in the modern "stile", we also have to admit that people still love decoration, most notably the most intimate surface of a person is more and more subject to decoration: the skin.

*The trend of tattooing and body piercing has become increasingly popular, and people are eager to express themselves through these forms of self-adornment. With the rise of social media, the visibility of these body modifications has also increased, and many individuals feel the need to stand out from the crowd by showcasing their unique designs.*
suggested_query: The trend of tattooing and body piercing has become increasingly popular, and people are eager to express themselves through these forms of self-adornment. With the rise of social media, the visibility of these body modifications has also increased, and many individuals feel the need to stand out from the crowd by showcasing their unique designs.
